page.description: Gets the local variable frame, used to pass local script variables down to other functions.
page.discussion: The LOCAL_VARIABLES() function returns a pointer to the collection of variables local to the layout or function.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example shows the variables local to the Interactive window.
section.example: dim a as C dim b as N a = "alpha" b = 12 ? local_variables() = a = "alpha" b = 12.000000

section.description: This example responds to the OnPush event of a button and reports on the local variables for the form.
section.example: dim vars as P dim varnames as C vars = local_variables() varnames = properties_enum(vars) ui_msg_box("Local Variables", varnames)
